title: Saturday Special - NFL Championship Weekend
itunes:title: Saturday Special - NFL Championship Weekend
description:
Colin gives his picks for Championship weekend and RJ Bell of Pregame.com and Fox Sports Radio tells him if the sharps in Vegas agree or disagree in this exclusive podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
